strength.name: Deadlifts
strength.description: Deadlifts are a compound exercise that targets multiple muscle groups including the back, glutes, and hamstrings.

strength.name: Bench Press
strength.description: The bench press is a classic upper body exercise that primarily targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

strength.name: Squats
strength.description: Squats are a fundamental lower body exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

strength.name: Pull-Ups
strength.description: Pull-ups are an effective upper body exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders.

cardiovascular.name: Running
cardiovascular.description: Running is a great cardiovascular exercise that improves endurance and overall cardiovascular health.

cardiovascular.name: Cycling
cardiovascular.description: Cycling is a low-impact cardiovascular exercise that strengthens the legs and improves cardiovascular fitness.

cardiovascular.name: Jump Rope
cardiovascular.description: Jump rope is a high-intensity cardiovascular exercise that improves coordination and agility.

flexibility.name: Yoga
flexibility.description: Yoga is a practice that combines physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation to improve flexibility, strength, and relaxation.

flexibility.name: Stretching Routine
flexibility.description: A stretching routine helps improve flexibility, prevent injury, and relieve muscle tension.

flexibility.name: Pilates
flexibility.description: Pilates is a low-impact exercise method that focuses on strengthening muscles while improving postural alignment and flexibility.
